decision_conditions: Hrs bldg wks resi amenity adj occ
description: Amendments to planning permission dated 16th March 2021 (RN 20/04933/FULL) for the Demolition of existing mansard roof and roof level plant and construction of two storey vertical roof addition with extensions at fourth, fifth, sixth and seventh floor levels for additional office (Class B1) floorspace. Use of the lower ground and basement level 1 for flexible/alternative office (Class B1)/retail (Class A1)/leisure uses (Class D2); basement level 2 for car parking, cycle parking, ancillary office uses and mechanical plant. Alterations to the existing building including new windows and entrance, new terraces to eighth and tenth floor levels and new plant enclosure at roof level and associated works namely to amend the wording of Condition 3 to allow the demolition phase to be split into phases.
